p.s: The scene from the Dramadrama Macbeth from the author Shakespeare is the 7th scene from the first Actact and deals with a dialogedialogue between Macbeth and Lady Macbeth, where Lady Macbeth tries to convince her husband of murdering King DucanDuncan.
The first paragraph from line 1 till line 8 starts with a question from Lady Macbeth.
She asks Macbeth why he has left the chamber.
Macbeth doesn't answer to this and wants to know if DucanDuncan askasks for him.
After this Lady Macbeth thinks Macbeth tells her that he has golden opinions from diffrenddifferent kind of peopelpeople and doesn't want to throw them away soon.
The second paragraph (l. 10-22) deals with Lady Macbeth and how she presents Macbeth what he could have.
She asks him if he is afraid of getting what he wantwants.
Furthermore she brings to his mind that he could hashave to say I dare not or I would and deosn'tdoesn't have to sevant for anybody.
Macbeth says she needs to be quiet and whoever dares to do more is none.
The last paragraph (l. 23-56) is about the plan of Lady Macbeth to make Macbeth a King.
She tells Macbeth about her plan and only when he does it he were a man.
After that she also makemakes Macbeth clear that he must makesmake something happen.
Macbeth is not convinced to this plan so Lady Macbeth telltells him exact what they will do.
Macbeth reacts with the answer that she souldshould bring forth men children only to him with a fearless character.
After this he thinks about to deceive the world and a face must hide wathwhat the heart doesn't know.
